Events.OnCreate:
(block Nil
(switch ; This mission only works in the starting system
(not (eq (sysGetNode) (objGetProperty gPlayerShip 'startingSystem))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; See if the mission is still available
(not (benedict_isMissionAvailable &msBenedictsDrones;)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Set up the mission
(block Nil ) ) )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block ( (ownerObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (trainingPos (sysVectorRandom ownerObj 20 15 "t"))
droneObjList )
; Create 3 training drones and set them to hold
(setq droneObjList (map (list 1 2 3) theIndex (block (theDrone) (setq theDrone (sysCreateShip &scTenhoveSentinel; (sysVectorPolarOffset trainingPos (multiply theIndex 120) 4) &svDefectiveAuton; ))
(shpOrder theDrone 'hold) (objRegisterForEvents gSource theDrone)
theDrone ) ) )
; Add each of the drones to our list of targets
(msnSetData gSource 'targetIDs (map droneObjList theObj (objGetID theObj)))
; Remember that we accepted this mission
(benedict_missionAccepted gSource)
; Once we accept this mission, we're done with the intro
(typSetData &unidBenedictStoryArc; 'introDone True) )
Events.OnAcceptedUndock: ; Remember when we started the battle (msnSetData gSource 'startTime (unvGetTick))
Events.OnDeclined:
(block ( (ownerObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (trainingMission (msnCreate &msBenedictTraining; ownerObj)) )
; Once we decline this mission, we're done with the intro
(typSetData &unidBenedictStoryArc; 'introDone True)
; Create the training mission
(if trainingMission (msnAccept trainingMission) )
; Complete the mission so we don't get offered it again
(msnSuccess gSource)
; Return Nil to exit
Nil )
Events.OnReward:
(block ( (ownerObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (trainingMission (msnCreate &msBenedictTraining; ownerObj)) )
; Auto-accept training mission
(if trainingMission (msnAccept trainingMission) )
; Nil means exit
Nil )

Language.Text:
(cat "Benedict wears a quasi-military uniform without patches or insignia. " "Skin-armor plates peek through his collar. He crosses his arms " "and turns to look at you:\n\n"
"\"I offer you training. Nothing more. Do what I say and " "you'll be ready for your journey.\"" )

(cat "\"You've got a good ship. She'll take you where you need to go. " "But you must learn to control her. You must fly better, faster, " "and more accurately than your targets.\n\n"
"\"Do you want to practice combat maneuvers?\"" )

(cat ""I'll launch three autons—autonomous ships—for target practice.

"
""Use the mouse to aim and [Ctrl] key to fire your primary weapon. You can also use the left-mouse button to fire and the right-mouse button to thrust. See if you can destroy them all.

"
""Ready?"" )

(cat "Benedict stares. A smile flashes for an instant.\n\n"
"\"Fine. You'll be working your weapons soon enough. " "Meet me in the Matriarch's Chamber when you're ready to tackle something more dangerous.\"" )

(cat "\"I guess I forgot to tell you they fire back. Don't worry: " "they're nothing compared to what you'll face out there.\n\n"
"\"Remember, use the [Ctrl] key to fire your primary weapon.\"" )
(cat "\"Excellent work! You destroyed all autons in " (unvGetElapsedGameTime (msnGetData gSource 'startTime) (msnGetData gSource 'endTime) 'display) ".\"" )
